required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: DFN15 Versus Placebo in Patients With Migraine Headaches

brief_summary.textblock: Crossover study of DFN15A versus DFN15B versus Placebo in the treatment of migraine headaches.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Patients Pain Free, as defined as a score of "0" on a numerical scale of "0" to "3"

facility.name: Clinvest/ A Division of Banyan Group, Inc.
